title: Marc: PE和PC版的领域做了一些小调整
author: Wolverine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-8-16 09:58 编辑 






Screenshot.png (34.16 KB, 下载次数: 2)

@Marc：
The whitelist limit for PE and PC Realms has now been raised to an arbitrarily large, but maybe reachable number. Good luck hitting it now!
PE版和PC版领域的白名单大小限制被提高了，但是仍然不能超过特定的数量。祝你好运！
